services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive cleaning solutions for your home and business.
services.residentialDesc: Comprehensive house cleaning services for your home, apartment, or villa in Jeddah. We cover everything from routine tidying to deep cleaning, ensuring a spotless, healthy, and comfortable living space for you and your family. We specialize in eco-friendly products.
services.commercialDesc: Professional commercial cleaning for offices, retail spaces, and business facilities in Jeddah. Our expert teams provide tailored cleaning solutions, including daily janitorial services, to maintain a pristine and productive work environment. Reliable and insured.
services.deepDesc: Our deep cleaning service is a thorough, top-to-bottom sanitization of your property. Ideal for spring cleaning, post-renovation, or preparing for an event. We tackle hard-to-reach areas, ensuring every corner is immaculate.
services.moveDesc: Stress-free move-in/move-out cleaning services. Whether you're vacating a property or settling into a new one, we provide a comprehensive clean to meet landlord requirements or ensure a fresh start.
services.tankDesc: Water tank cleaning, insulation, and disinfection for healthy water.
services.pestDesc: Safe and effective pest and termite control services.
services.steamDesc: Steam cleaning for sofas, carpets, and curtains to remove stains and germs.
services.acDesc: Cleaning and maintenance of split AC units for better air quality.

about.title: About Master Clean Care
about.p1: Master Clean Care is a leading cleaning service provider dedicated to delivering exceptional cleanliness and hygiene solutions in Jeddah. With years of experience in the industry, we pride ourselves on our commitment to quality, professionalism, and customer satisfaction.
about.p2: Our mission is to create healthier and more comfortable living and working environments for our clients. We achieve this by employing highly trained and trustworthy cleaning professionals, utilizing advanced cleaning techniques, and using eco-friendly products that are safe for your family, pets, and the environment.
about.p3: We offer a comprehensive range of services tailored to meet the diverse needs of our residential and commercial clients in Jeddah, including deep cleaning, move-in/move-out cleaning, office cleaning, and specialized services like tank cleaning and marble polishing. Our flexible scheduling and customized cleaning plans ensure that we can accommodate your specific requirements.
about.p4: At Master Clean Care, we believe in building long-term relationships with our clients based on trust and reliability. We are constantly striving to exceed expectations and set new standards in the cleaning industry. Choose Master Clean Care for a spotless space and a healthier life.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.p1: This Privacy Policy describes how Master Clean Care collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you visit or make a purchase from our website.
privacyPolicy.p2: We collect personal information you provide to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and message content when you use our contact form or request a service. We also collect certain information automatically when you visit our site, including your IP address, browser type, and browsing activity.
privacyPolicy.p3: We use the information we collect to provide and maintain our services, process your inquiries and requests, communicate with you, improve our website and services, and for marketing purposes. We may also use your information to comply with legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.p4: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing services to you, provided that these parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also disclose your information when required by law.
privacyPolicy.p5: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacyPolicy.p6: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also have the right to restrict or object to certain processing of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided on our website.
privacyPolicy.p7: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacyPolicy.p8: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@masterclean-care.com.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
termsAndConditions.p1: Welcome to Master Clean Care. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Master Clean Care's Website.
termsAndConditions.p2: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Master Clean Care if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
termsAndConditions.p3: The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: 'Client', 'You' and 'Your' refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company's terms and conditions. 'The Company', 'Ourselves', 'We', 'Our' and 'Us', refers to our Company. 'Party', 'Parties', or 'Us', refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client's needs in respect of provision of the Company's stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Saudi Arabia.
termsAndConditions.p4: Master Clean Care agrees to provide cleaning services as described on our website and as agreed upon with the client. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.
termsAndConditions.p5: Payment for services is due upon completion of the service, unless otherwise agreed upon in writing. We accept various payment methods as indicated on our website. All prices are subject to change without prior notice.
termsAndConditions.p6: Clients must provide at least 24 hours notice for any cancellation or rescheduling of services. Failure to do so may result in a cancellation fee. We reserve the right to cancel or reschedule services due to unforeseen circumstances.

reviews.title: What Our Clients Say
reviews.subtitle: Read what our satisfied customers have to say about our services
reviews.review1: The team was professional, thorough, and paid attention to every detail. My house has never been cleaner!
reviews.review2: Excellent service! They use eco-friendly products and the staff is very courteous. Highly recommended!
reviews.review3: Very reliable and consistent service. They always go above and beyond my expectations.
